scripts.watchExternals: cross-env concurrently "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-components watch" "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-components watch:lib" "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-components watch:esnext" "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-theme watch" "yarn workspace @haaretz/app-utils watch" "yarn workspace @haaretz/htz-react-server watch"
scripts.dev:watch: cross-env concurrently "yarn workspace @haaretz/haaretz.co.il dev" "yarn workspace @haaretz/haaretz.co.il watchExternals"
scripts.dev: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development graphql-server" " cross-env NODE_ENV=development htz-react-server htz | bunyan -L"
scripts.dev:debug: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development graphql-server" " cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --inspect-brk ./node_modules/.bin/htz-react-server htz | bunyan -L"
scripts.dev:watchInternal: cross-env concurrently "yarn workspace @haaretz/haaretz.co.il dev" "yarn workspace @haaretz/haaretz.co.il watch"
scripts.dev:2prod: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production graphql-server" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development CONNECTION_PRESET=dev2prod htz-react-server htz | bunyan -L"
scripts.dev:dev: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development graphql-server" "cross-env CONNECTION_PRESET=dev NODE_ENV=development htz-react-server htz | bunyan -L"
scripts.start:dev2stage: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development graphql-server" "cross-env CONNECTION_PRESET=dev2prod NODE_ENV=production htz-react-server htz | bunyan -L"
scripts.start:dev2prod: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production graphql-server" "cross-env CONNECTION_PRESET=dev2prod NODE_ENV=production htz-react-server htz | bunyan -L"
scripts.start:dev: cross-env concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production graphql-server" "cross-env CONNECTION_PRESET=dev NODE_ENV=production htz-react-server htz | bunyan -L"
